law.catch_line: Contract or agreement voidable by consumer if resulting from nonconforming telephone solicitation.
law.text: A contract or agreement made as a result of a telephone solicitation violating KRS 367.46951 to 367.46999 is voidable by the consumer for any reason at any time and shall not be enforced against the consumer.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 302, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 463, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This statute was created by 1994 Ky. Acts chs. 302 and 463, which are substantively identical and have been codified together. Minor variations have been resolved by giving precedence to Acts ch. 463 which was enacted last.
